channel.title: Comments on: David asks, “Can leaving my phone plugged in all night be bad for it?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Rob
item.dc:creator: Rob
item.description: Did no one read the article?

item.title: By: Sophia
item.dc:creator: Sophia
item.description: Great! This is the first time I've known about charge cycles. Thanks so much for your tips. I will try to reduce use of my mobile phone
item.content:encoded: Great! This is the first time I’ve known about charge cycles. Thanks so much for your tips. I will try to reduce use of my mobile phone

item.title: By: Jordan Henderson
item.dc:creator: Jordan Henderson
item.description: There is an app called Ace Charge it cut the power on fully charge. its really beneficial for over night charging I think its prolong your battery life!
item.content:encoded: There is an app called Ace Charge it cut the power on fully charge. its really beneficial for over night charging I think its prolong your battery life!

item.title: By: Jordan Henderson

item.description: There is app called Ace Charge it cute the power on fully charge. its really beneficial for over night charging I think its prolong your battery life!
item.content:encoded: There is app called Ace Charge it cute the power on fully charge. its really beneficial for over night charging I think its prolong your battery life!

item.title: By: ChargeSpot
item.dc:creator: ChargeSpot
item.description: I think leaving phones charging for whole night isn't good thing as it harms the life of your batteries and pose a danger to the phones as well. Phone mus be disconnect after charging battery full. It will long last your phones battery life.Thanks a lot for sharing these tips. I'm sure to keep in mind while charging phone.
item.content:encoded: I think leaving phones charging for whole night isn’t good thing as it harms the life of your batteries and pose a danger to the phones as well. Phone mus be disconnect after charging battery full. It will long last your phones battery life.Thanks a lot for sharing these tips. I’m sure to keep in mind while charging phone.

item.title: By: Ali
item.dc:creator: Ali
item.description: When my iphone is inplug overnight in morning the percentage of battery is decrease and this confirms it that charging was stopped after a full charge.
item.content:encoded: When my iphone is inplug overnight in morning the percentage of battery is decrease and this confirms it that charging was stopped after a full charge.

item.title: By: mike
item.dc:creator: mike
item.description: Excellent. I have been leaving my phone and ipad plugged in at home and wondered if I was doing the right thing. My phone aways alerts me to unplug when fully charged. But my albeit limited knowledge of these batteries made me think that a fully charged battery should disconnect when full and bypass battery while on charger. Glad to see this point out there. Any experts or others out there disagree? It would be interesting to hear their reasoning.
item.content:encoded: Excellent. I have been leaving my phone and ipad plugged in at home and wondered if I was doing the right thing. My phone aways alerts me to unplug when fully charged. But my albeit limited knowledge of these batteries made me think that a fully charged battery should disconnect when full and bypass battery while on charger. Glad to see this point out there. Any experts or others out there disagree? It would be interesting to hear their reasoning.
